name: Abbas Kakar
personality: loyal and dedicated to his duties
story: Abdul-Qadir comes from a small village in the heart of the Persian Gulf. He joined the army at a young age and has since worked tirelessly to rise through the ranks. He takes great pride in his role as an ammo bearer and is always willing to go the extra mile to ensure his team has what they need. Despite the dangers of his job and the many years spent away from home, Abdul-Qadir remains faithful to his duties and his country.
